titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3448) to improve the ability of the United States to prevent, prepare for, and respond to bioterrorism and other public health emergencies.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-483, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 163.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 427.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 403 - 19 (Roll no. 186).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/22/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3448 (biological chemical attack and bioterrorism preparedness).
